content:
I understand that cargo captures the stdout and stderr output of the rustc it invokes, but reading cargo's docs and book I can't find a good explanation.
I'm modifying rustc's diagnostic logging in my custom toolchain but nothing comes out, regardless of RUSTC_LOG's setting.
I can just invoke rustc directly as usual, but I just wanted to know why this happens.
@Iñaki Garay it's probably cached the lack of output
